divs: Sighting DetailsMy 8 year old daughter and I were watching tv in our living room when a bright lightness appeared in the room.I thought it was just a full moon brightness,as I do not follow the table of such things.I noticed that the light moved ,not in a normal way,and went to the glass doors on our porch to see what was so bright.There was the moon,full,but much too small to be the moon.It swayed,zoomed,seemed to almost play with us to watch it for over a half hour.It was quite scary.I did become defensive,sending my daughter to bed,but this thing just kept zooming in and out of the frame of our sliding glass door frame for over an hour,it seemed to really be only about 25 feet square,in size.Whatever it was,it was certainly not the moon,a plane,or anything else I had ever seen.I heard no sound,at all,during this things entire visit.I did feel fear,as it seemed to want me to open the door for it,but I did not.Eventually,it screamed away,no sound,but a very fast ,2 seconds ? ,departure
